name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
description:
Presented by d20th Century Studios

  • A PBTA hack inspired by the film The Nightmare Before Christmas. 
  • Playable as is, right out of the box. No preparation needed, though you might want to watch the movie.
  • Playbooks for Jack Skellington, Dr. Finkelsein, Sally, Lock, Shock & Barrel and the Mayor.
  • GM notes for each of the Holiday worlds including custom moves, NPCs and more.
